name: microsoft-auth
description: This repository contains a dialog example plugin for the [Cognigy Webchat](https://github.com/Cognigy/WebchatWidget). It is meant to be used as a starting point when building a dialog-like plugin for the Cognigy Webchat. The Dialog is styled based on the Webchat's `theme` for seamless integration.
author: Cognigy GmbH
